tool_description: Tracks and reports the delivery status, open rates, and engagement metrics for sent review request messages.

delivery_ids.description: List of delivery tracking IDs to monitor

error_messages: Empty delivery IDs: delivery_ids array cannot be empty.
Invalid delivery ID: One or more delivery IDs are not valid or not found.
Invalid check interval: check_interval must be between 1 and 60 minutes.
Monitoring service unavailable: Unable to connect to delivery tracking service.
usage: Provide delivery tracking IDs from sent messages to monitor their status, delivery confirmation, and engagement metrics.

delivery_statuses.description: Current delivery status for each message: delivered, pending, failed, bounced

opened_count.description: Number of messages that were opened

clicked_count.description: Number of messages with link clicks

open_rate.description: Percentage of delivered messages that were opened
